{{ _('Introduction') }}

{{ _('The High School Affiliated to Renmin University of China is a world-renowned public school founded in 1950. The school offers both Chinese and international curricula. Two types of Chinese curricula are offered: the national curriculum and the Early Development Program for Top Innovative Talents. Three international curricula are offered at the Chinese-Foreign Education Program: the Cambridge International Advanced Level (A Level) program, started in 2004; the Advanced Placement (AP) program, started in 2010; and the International Baccalaureate Diploma (IB) program, started in 2012. Students are regularly admitted to top Universities domestically and abroad.') }}
